divs: Sighting DetailsWe were watching fireworks and and then we saw a circular light coming towards us and then it stopped, was stationary for about 45 seconds. The clouds covered it, and it disappeared. It was not fireworks and not a star. My husband thought it was a meteor at first. We got a picture of it.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Clermont
There were no other sightings in Clermont on or around July 4th 2013
